scenes.background: You decide to polish the slides first. [Bob] seems uneasy.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'It's just that market trends could really strengthen our case. Are you sure we can skip them?'

options.text: Let's focus on nailing the presentation first, then we can add the trends if time permits.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by focusing on the immediate task, but empathy is lower as you dismiss Bob's concern.

options.text: You're right, the trends are important. I'll start gathering the data now.
options.analysis: You demonstrate high emotional perception and social skills by agreeing with Bob, but may struggle with self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Maybe we can split tasks. I'll polish the slides while you look up the trends.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills by suggesting a compromise, but your emotional perception is lower as you delegate Bob's concern.
